post_detail.description: J+V directors have both received 2011 Webby Awards for their work on Grammar Nazis, a parody of Quentin Tarantino’s Inglorious Bastards. Paper magazine ranked their sketch Woman Afraid of Owls number 3 in their list of 2011’s top 10 Funniest Videos Online. Their work has also received praise from E!, CNN, The Huffington Post, The New York Times, The Today Show, and more. Ruben and Peone, who are regular performers at the Upright Citizen’s Brigade, are also the founders of sketch group Dutch West.
post_detail.title: Award Winning Spots
